data.event: In 1871 he stayed at Astrolabe Bay just south of present-day Madang for 15 months.

event.title: 1884 the German New Guinea Company arrived and tried

data.event: In 1884 the German New Guinea Company arrived and tried to establish a base at various locations including at present day Madang but were continually beaten by malaria.

event.title: a fight during World War II in 1942

data.event: The Japanese invaded and captured Madang without a fight during World War II in 1942.
In September 1943, Australian forces launched a sustained campaign to retake the Finisterre Range and Madang.
The town was captured on April 24, 1944.
